title: Copeiro (a) - Nutrição Produção - Clínica São Vicente
description:
- Desejável experiência na função como Copeiro(a);

Atividades:

- Realizar a distribuição e reposição das refeições, assegurando a higienização, pré-preparação, transporte e armazenamento de todos os gêneros e equipamentos utilizados.

- Controlar o quantitativo de utensílios existentes no local de trabalho, conforme o padrão estabelecido pela Instituição, realizando conferência e registro em formulário específico.

- Higienizar, cortar e embalar frios e frutas, garantindo excelência no produto final.

- Preparar e repor saladas, segundo as orientações da gestão imediata, mantendo o fluxo do serviço adequado.

- Separar as porções e distribuir as refeições servidas aos pacientes, liberadas pelo nutricionista, conforme as metas internacionais de segurança.

- Utilizar adequadamente o EPI em suas tarefas, garantindo a própria segurança e a dos pacientes, segundo as normas internacionais de segurança.

- Distribuir, recolher e zelar pelos utensílios do setor.

Outras informações:

- Local de trabalho: Clínica São Vicente - Gávea

- Escala de trabalho: Escala 12x36 - Das 19h às 7h

- Disponibilidade para treinamento.

- A empresa, fundada em 1977 como “Cardiolab”, atualmente conta com 75 hospitais próprios e 3 sob gestão, além de 55 clínicas oncológicas, nos estados do RJ, SP, MG, PE, BA, MA, SE, CE, AL, PB, PR, MS, PA e DF.

- Gerencia diferentes marcas, com presença marcante no Rio de Janeiro (“D’Or”), em SP (“São Luiz”), em PE (“Esperança”), no DF (“Santa Luzia” e “Santa Helena”), no MA (“UDI”), na BA (“São Rafael”), em SE (“São Lucas”), no PR (“Santa Cruz”), em MG (“Biocor”), em MS (“Proncor”), em PB (“Nossa Senhora das Neves”), em CE (“São Carlos”), além da marca premium “Star” nos estados do RJ, SP e DF.

- Em 23 de dezembro de 2022, a proposta de valor da Rede D’Or foi reforçada com a fusão com a SulAmérica, maior seguradora do Brasil e uma das maiores operadoras de saúde do país, atuando em seguros saúde, odonto, vida, acidentes pessoais, gestão de ativos e previdência privada, com mais de 4 mil colaboradores e mais de 7 milhões de clientes no Brasil.

- Acreditamos na responsabilidade social e na inclusão, por isso, todas as vagas estão abertas a pessoas de diferentes perfis e contextos, incluindo pessoas com deficiência.

- Se você é uma pessoa qualificada, inovadora e atualizada em sua área, junte-se à nossa equipe.

- Oferecemos mais que vagas de trabalho, oferecemos oportunidades para fazer a diferença.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Court Paralegal Team Lead
description:
Our mission is to change as many lives as possible by offering immigration solutions even in the most difficult cases. We look at all possible options to keep our clients in the United States with their families where they belong. We stand ready to fight even when success seems unsure because we understand how much better life can be with the dignity and peace of mind that comes with having documents.

About the role

The Paralegal Team Lead needs to be an exceptional leader and a cooperative team player. The Team Lead must supervise the other paralegals, monitor the work production of the support staff, and identify and engage in ways to improve efficiency.

Payrate: 10$/hr (40 hours per week)

Schedule: Monday to Friday 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST

What you'll do

1. Supervise and manage a team of Court Team paralegals by providing guidance, support, performance evaluations and management, and payroll to ensure high levels of productivity and morale

2. Create and execute training and development plans for new hires and current team members

3. Attend leadership meetings with up-to-date information on key performance indicators (KPIs), the status of projects, and overall work product of the Court paralegal team

4. Develop and document procedures for new case types as the firm expands its practice areas

5. Oversee and ensure that team members are completing a thorough review of all case information that is returned and identifying opportunities/inconsistencies that require attorneys’ attention

6. Serve as the primary point of escalation for reviewing or processing Court Team requests that are highly complex, unique or unusual

7. Other duties and responsibilities, as assigned by management

Minimum Education and Experience Requirements (Essential Skills, Knowledge & Abilities)

1. Highschool diploma or equivalent

2. Associate's degree in paralegal studies or related field or paralegal certificationpreferred. Relevant experience as an immigration paralegal in a law firm may be substituted for the degree requirement

3. Prior experience with 1 or more of the following immigration fields a plus, VAWA, T-Visa, U-Visa, Asylum, Medical DA, I-601, Adjustment of Status, DS-260, DS-160

4. Strong knowledge of legal terminology, principles, and procedures and experience utilizing these in an immigration setting

5. Advanced computer skills (Proficient with MS Office or similar programs including Adobe, Dropbox, Salesforce, Document Managements, etc.)

6. Possesses excellent English interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal, bilingual in Spanish preferred

7. Positive attitude with ability to motivate and manage a diverse team

8. Excellent analytical, problem solving and creative thinking skills

9. Enjoy working in a fast-paced, results driven environment

10. Bilingual (English and Spanish) preferred

title: Level Designer/Artist - Unreal Engine 5, Dark Fantasy aRPG, Kristala
description:
About the Studio:

Astral Clocktower Studios is a women-led, indie game development studio currently crafting Kristala, a dark fantasy, action RPG built in Unreal Engine 5. In Kristala players take on the role of magical feline warriors exploring a rich, story-driven world filled with danger, beauty, and ancient secrets.


We’re a remote team of passionate developers and creatives from around the globe, and we’re looking for a talented Level Designer/Level Artist to help shape compelling, immersive, and emotionally resonant environments.


Your Role:

As our Level Designer, you’ll collaborate closely with our design, art, and engineering teams to build and refine levels that blend visual storytelling, combat, traversal, and exploration. You’ll transform blockouts into living spaces that challenge and inspire players and make the world of Kristala unforgettable.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement levels that support the game’s vision, mechanics, and tone
  • Block out and iterate on layouts using Unreal Engine 5
  • Collaborate across disciplines to integrate story, combat, and environmental storytelling
  • Place enemies and interactive elements to support pacing and player agency
  • Conduct playtests and refine level flow, difficulty, and engagement based on feedback


Core Qualifications:

  • 2+ years experience as a Level Designer or in a similar role
  • Strong proficiency with Unreal Engine 5
  • Portfolio showcasing playable levels or layout designs (graybox or final builds)
  • Solid understanding of pacing, traversal, visual storytelling, and encounter design
  • Fluent in English with strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Comfortable using Discord for daily communication and project tracking
  • Ability to balance creativity with technical constraints and production timelines


Bonus Points For:

  • Shipped one or more commercial game titles
  • Advanced knowledge of Unreal’s landscape and terrain tools
  • Experience designing for Soulslike or action RPG mechanics
  • Interest in worldbuilding, lore integration, or environmental storytelling
  • Passion for games and a strong grasp of genre trends

title: Platform Consultant (Remote - US Eastern Time Zone)
description:
We’re looking for a web-savvy Platform Consultant to join the interop.io Consulting Team. This unique role blends hands-on JavaScript development and full-stack exposure with client-facing consulting. In this role you’ll lead and coach clients to deliver interoperable software solutions using our io.Connect Software Platform Suite.


If you're a technically skilled, outgoing professional who thrives in fast-paced, client-focused environments—and you’re passionate about solving complex B2B challenges, especially in capital markets, this role is tailored for you!


In this role you will:


  • Develop and prototype JavaScript/interop-based solutions, including proof-of-concepts, to address client use cases and workflows
  • Advise clients on technical strategy, architecture, and implementation of interoperable systems using modern web framework
  • Collaborate with clients’ teams to assess needs, lead projects, coach developers, and ultimately align businesses with IT
  • Assist clients in the building and maintenance of complex front-end applications, such as dashboards and interactive platforms, for professional users
  • Liaise with internal teams (Product Engineering, Sales, Support, Client Success) to ensure project success
  • Deliver presentations and engage in live client interactions, improvising as needed to address challenges


Your profile:


  • 5+ years of experience in front-end or full-stack development including modern JavaScript (ES6+)
  • Hands-on experience with JavaScript frameworks (preferably React), including responsive design, state management, and component testing
  • Familiarity with TypeScript or other programming languages (e.g., .NET, Java, Python, C++)
  • Proficiency with asynchronous programming (Promises, async/await), Node.js, and version control systems (e.g., Git)
  • Experience in enterprise environments with established mechanisms for governance, CICD, and other systematic approaches for managing horizontal scale
  • Strong client-facing experience with excellent verbal and written English fluency
  • Experience in technical consulting, solutions architecture, or B2B presales/account management
  • Established skills in discovery, design thinking, or business analysis.
  • Proven ability to deliver projects under pressure in collaboration with client IT organizations
  • Background in capital markets, institutional trading, or financial services technology would be considered as a plus
  • Willingness to work during U.S. Eastern Time (ET) business hours and ability to travel occasionally to the US


To help us process your application efficiently, please ensure your CV is in English.

title: QA Engineer (Brazil)
description:
QA Engineer

BeyondRisk AI-6

Brazil (Remote)


QA Engineer

Help us ship bullet-proof AI at scale. BeyondRisk AI-6 is looking for a QA Engineer who can own the full testing lifecycle - manual, automated, and AI-assisted - to ensure every release of our AI platform is rock solid.


About the Role

You’ll design and execute test strategies across web UIs, APIs, and microservices. From writing Selenium/Cypress suites to poking REST endpoints with Postman, you’ll hunt bugs before our users ever see them. You’ll wire your tests into our CI/CD pipelines, flag/flunk bad builds, and partner with DevOps for zero-touch deployments.


QA Engineer

Location: Remote, Brazil


About BeyondRisk AI-6

BeyondRisk empowers organizations to rapidly design, build, and scale AI-driven solutions through our AI-6 platform. We seamlessly bring together smart agents, data, and automation so enterprises can solve their toughest challenges at speed. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors - we’re expanding our core engineering team. If you’re passionate about building intuitive interfaces for cutting-edge AI, join us.


Key Responsibilities

  • Manual & Exploratory Testing: Create and maintain test plans, exploratory charters, and regression checklists.
  • Test Automation: Build end-to-end UI tests (Selenium or Cypress) and API tests (Postman/Newman or similar).
  • API & Integration Testing: Validate REST/GraphQL endpoints, data flows, and backend integrations.
  • Bug Tracking & Reporting: Reproduce, triage, and track defects in Jira ; verify fixes and prevent regressions.
  • CI/CD Quality Gates: Embed automated tests into Git-based pipelines; block faulty builds and surface metrics.
  • Scripting & Tooling: Write lightweight Bash or Python scripts to seed data, mock services, or extend frameworks.
  • Collaboration: Work hand-in-hand with developers, DevOps, and product managers to ship on a predictable rhythm.


You’ll Excel in This Role If You:

  • Know Testing Inside Out: Solid grounding in functional, regression, and integration testing methodologies.
  • Automate Relentlessly: Hands-on with Selenium, Cypress, Postman/Newman, or equivalent frameworks.
  • Speak API Fluently: Confident validating request/response payloads, headers, auth flows, and error handling.
  • Track & Triage Like a Pro: Comfortable creating clear, actionable Jira tickets that engineers love (and fear).
  • Think in Pipelines: Understand how QA fits into DevOps; you wire tests into CI and keep the build clean.
  • Code Just Enough: Bash/Python/TypeScript chops for crafting helpers, stubs, or data generators.
  • Bonus Points: Experience using LLMs or AI tools to auto-generate test cases, data, or scripts.


Why Join BeyondRisk

  • Compensation & Equity: Competitive salary + stock options.
  • High-Impact Role: Directly shape the user experience of a cutting-edge AI platform used by global enterprises.
  • Cutting-Edge AI Platform: Work on the frontend interfaces for a next-gen hyper-automation solution transforming enterprises.
  • Culture & Learning: A culture of continuous learning, technical excellence, and close collaboration between engineering and AI/ML teams.
  • Global Collaboration: Thrive in a dynamic, international environment, working closely with talented colleagues across the US, Europe, and Asia.
  • Fast-Paced Growth: Collaborate with a passionate team and a hands-on leadership group, backed by top Silicon Valley investors.
  • Long-Term Opportunity: Shape the future of AI – be at the forefront of enterprise innovation by building the technology that enables it.


Ready to Break Things (Before Users Do)?

Apply now with an up-to-date CV (PDF). Let’s build trustworthy AI together.

title: Software Engineer III
description:
What You'll Do


Avalara is an AI-first company. We expect every engineer, manager, and leader to actively leverage AI to enhance productivity, quality, innovation, and customer value. AI is embedded in our workflows, decision-making, and products — and success at Avalara requires embracing AI as an essential capability, not an optional tool. We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to lead in the updating of solutions used by some of our largest customers including national governments.


You will report directly to the senior manager of the department and you will bring expertise in architectural principles, system design best practices, driving the creation of platforms that address complex challenges and empower global organizations. You will demand a blend of technical leadership and hands-on execution.


  • This is a fully remote position; however, only candidates residing in Brazil will be accepted.


What Your Responsibilities Will Be


  • Contribute to hands-on software development: Participate in daily coding tasks, collaborating with teams to solve complex technical challenges, design scalable solutions, and contribute directly to the delivery of high-quality software;
  • Optimization Focus: Address performance, scalability, observability, and security challenges through design and optimization strategies;
  • Collaboration: Partner with product managers, UX designers, and team members to align technical solutions with our goals. Represent the team in architectural review boards;
  • Documentation: Create comprehensive technical documentation, including system diagrams, architectural decisions, and design patterns;
  • Risk Management: Find and address technical risks, ensuring long-term sustainability and understanding of team goals;
  • Leverage AI copilots, code generation tools, and assistants (e.g., GitHub Copilot, AmazonQ, ChatGPT) to improve coding efficiency, testing, documentation, and prototyping.
  • Continuously upskill in AI-related technologies applicable to daily work.



What You'll Need to be Successful


  • Experience: 3+ years in software development and architecture, with demonstrated expertise in building large-scale, distributed systems for enterprise environments;
  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field;
  • Proficiency in C# or Java;
  • Experience building, maintaining, and supporting foundational shared services supporting cloud-native applications;
  • Proficiency in RESTful APIs, OAuth, and secure authentication protocols;
  • Experience with streaming technologies such as Kafka and databases such as Postgres and MongoDB;
  • Hands-on experience with public cloud providers and DevOps tools (e.g., Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and GCP).
  • Development Practices: Agile methodologies, TDD, and CI/CD pipelines;
  • Soft Skills: Experience approaching a problem from different angles, analyzing pros and cons of different solutions; Experience communicating updates and resolutions to customers and other partners, and an approach to driving innovation;
  • English Fluency: Fluent English is a requirement for this role.
  • Only resumes submitted in English will be considered.
  • #LI-Remote

title: Machine Learning Engineer (Floorplan-to-3D Automation)
description:
About Formify

Formify is building the future of digital manufacturing for interior spaces --- from online 3D configuration to ready-to-machine outputs for kitchens, closets, and bathrooms. As part of our roadmap, we're developing AI tools that convert floorplans into 3D layouts to accelerate design, quoting, and production workflows.


Your Role

We're seeking an AI/ML Engineer to lead the development of a system that can analyze floorplan images (PDFs, DWGs, etc.) and convert them into 3D geometry --- walls, doors, windows, and more --- ready for our CPQ engine. You'll develop core AI capabilities and work closely with our design automation and backend teams to bring intelligent layout recognition to life.


What You'll Do

  • Design and train deep learning models to extract spatial and semantic information from 2D floorplans (images or vector files).
  • Develop pipelines to convert detected geometry into structured 3D models (e.g., wall objects, door/window placement).
  • Work with vector data (DXF/DWG), PDFs, or raster images to detect key architectural features.
  • Collaborate with CAD and backend engineers to translate AI output into parametric geometry.
  • Optimize models for speed, accuracy, and usability in real-world production environments.
  • Create optimal cabinetry layouts and suggestions from data provided from designers.


Experience Levels

Mid-Level (3-6 years experience)

  • Strong experience with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow) and vision models (YOLO, UNet, Detectron, etc.)
  • Experience in computer vision or document/image parsing
  • Understanding of geometry-based learning and spatial context
  • Ability to translate model output into geometric representations


Senior Level (6+ years experience)

  • Advanced expertise in geometry-based learning , OCR with spatial context , and complex vision systems
  • Proven ability to lead ML projects from conception to production
  • Experience with CAD/BIM environments, Rhino/Grasshopper, or geometry processing libraries (e.g., trimesh, Open3D)
  • Track record of deploying ML models in real-world manufacturing or design environments
  • Project leadership and team mentoring experience


Bonus Experience

  • Experience with CAD/BIM environments, Rhino/Grasshopper, or geometry processing libraries
  • Knowledge of architectural drawing standards and conventions
  • Experience in manufacturing or design automation industries


Why You'll Love This

  • You'll work at the bleeding edge of vision + design automation.
  • Your work will drastically reduce the time from inspiration to production in the interiors industry.
  • Join a cross-functional team where AI connects directly to real-world manufacturing.
  • Competitive compensation with opportunity to pioneer AI applications in manufacturing.

title: Senior Back-end Engineer (Python)
description:
We are Software Mind, an awesome team of engineers who are ready to ramp up any top-notch company’s projects! Our aim? To always be one step ahead. Become part of a multicultural company in constant growth with an excellent work environment certified by Great Place To Work!


Project - the aim you'll have


We're looking for a skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python) to join our dynamic team building an AI-powered “co-intelligence” for industrial manufacturing, combining data analytics, generative AI, and interactive guidance to help reduce wasted energy and carbon footprint from large manufacturers. You will play a key role in designing and implementing the core business logic behind our user-facing applications. These applications are the daily workflow tools for plant engineers and operators, proactively assembling insights, guiding decisions, and managing complex industrial processes.

You will collaborate closely with data infrastructure engineers, AI engineers, and front- end developers to deliver complete solutions - from early prototypes to production- grade systems. As part of a small, fast-moving team, you’ll have broad ownership and the opportunity to extend your contributions across the stack, including infrastructure, data pipelines, and front-end development, based on your skills and interests.

If you enjoy working with cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced environment this opportunity is for you!


Expectations - the experience you need


  • 10+ years of professional software development experience, with at least 5 years of Python development focused on backend systems.
  • Proven experience building backend services with complex business logic - not just API wiring, but thoughtful state management, data modeling, and lifecycle orchestration.
  • Strong working knowledge of SQL; experience with relational databases (e.g. Postgres), database schema design and evolution, and designing application- layer data workflows.
  • Solid computer science fundamentals, including algorithmic thinking, data structures (graphs, queues, etc.), and design patterns.
  • Experience building RESTful APIs (and/or GraphQL) and integrating backend services with external systems.
  • Strong unit and integration testing practices, and experience integrating with CI/CD pipelines.
  • Comfortable working in a dynamic, early-stage startup environment: independent, adaptable, proactive, and able to drive work forward with minimal oversight.
  • Excellent communication skills — ability to translate requirements into technical designs, iterate with teammates, and build consensus.


Nice to have


  • Demonstrated experience contributing to open-source projects.
  • Experience building data-focused backend services to support data-driven visualizations, dashboards, and analytics applications.
  • Familiarity with containerization (Docker) and cloud deployments (GCP preferred, AWS/Azure acceptable).
  • Experience setting up scalable development processes for application backends (testing strategies, CI/CD, monitoring, observability).
  • Familiarity with data lifecycle management, data lineage, and best practices for maintaining data integrity in complex systems.
  • Experience working in Agile/Scrum development environments.
  • Full-stack development experience with modern front-end frameworks (React, Next.js, Typescript).
  • Experience with event-driven architectures or message queues (e.g., Pub/Sub).


Position – how you’ll contribute


  • Design, develop, and operate Python-based backend services and APIs to power data- driven web applications.
  • Architect and implement complex business logic and state management for applications involving event lifecycles, workflow orchestration, and intelligent data processing.
  • Integrate with our time-series data platform and AI reasoning engine to deliver proactive, interactive features to end users.
  • Own the full application feature lifecycle: from rapid prototyping to scalable production deployment, with strong testing and CI/CD practices.
  • Shape the overall architecture of application backends, collaborating with peers across data engineering, AI, infrastructure, and front-end teams.
  • Support customer pilots and implementations by developing custom data processing and analytics modules as needed.


Our offer – professional development, personal growth


  • Educational resources
  • Flexible schedule and Work From Anywhere
  • Referral Program
  • Supportive and chill atmosphere


We are accepting applications from LATAM countries.

title: Senior Full-Stack Web Software Engineer (Remote)
description:
Unilingo connects a single video to every audience, in every language, on every major platform — with no extra work. This is not some ‘one-click’ marketing fluff. With Unilingo, one upload is all it takes. We pioneered multi-language content for YouTube, putting MrBeast and other top creators into 10+ languages. Since then, we've given creators 100 billion views, $50 million in AdSense revenue, and global recognition. With 48,000+ global submissions in the pipeline, we're only getting started. We’re building the command center for digital content — a syndication network that publishes from a single upload to any platform, in any format, in any language.


What you build here will be seen in every country on Earth.


Please email your resume to:


The Role

We’re a growing team of self-motivated engineers. We put in long hours not because we have to but because we care about the impact we’re generating. We hope to do more in a week than most other teams do in a month.

We are looking for a full-stack engineer who’s excited to experience the adventure of being in an early stage startup. We hope for your time here to be the most rewarding in your career. You’ll be given a lot of responsibility and the freedom to solve problems.


Responsibilities

  • Own the problem and work with the engineers and designer to generate a solution
  • Build, test, and ship features that solves user problems
  • Look at data and talk to users to get feedback about the feature
  • Triage and fix bugs
  • Generate proposals (through meetings, docs, and Figma) to help align team on your solution if it’s a multi-person effort
  • Review PRs to ensure that you’re not siloed in your own feature and that standards are upheld


Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience with Node, React, and Typescript
  • You’re not afraid to touch all parts of code when needed — from mouse click to DB. If you specialize in back-end, you should at least be able to disable a button on the front-end. If you’re front-end, you should at least be able to cast a return type of an endpoint field from a string to an int
  • Deploy your own code. We don’t have an ops team here, so you get to own deployment as well
  • Excellent written skills (in English)
  • B2 or above spoken English proficiency


Bonus

  • Previous startup experience — having started your own or joined one before
  • Python and some experience with implementing or deploying ML models
  • Speaks a language other than English (and code)
  • Cloud functions, NoSQL DB


Why Work With Us

You’ll hopefully experience the highest growth rate of your career here. You’ll be given freedom to execute. You and the rest of the team will likely make mistakes, but that’s okay because it’s a signal that we’re going to the edge of our capabilities - which means growth. We believe that this is what a startup is all about.


You will be working closely with Jon, our CTO, and Farbod, our CEO. Jon is an ex-Meta engineer and a top creator himself in his past life with 20M+ views across YouTube and TikTok. Farbod is a serial entrepreneur with one exit and is obsessed about distributing the highest quality content for their users. He’s spent months living with creators (literally) to understand their workflows, pain points, and what they need next.


Values

  • Mission over team over self : We value distributing content to our customers globally, working hard, and having fun with our team — without ego. Everyone at the company contributes to the final product.
  • We constantly question the status quo : We don’t copy what’s been done before. We ask, “What would this look like if we started from scratch?” and we’re not afraid to break norms to do things better.
  • Work hard and smart : We put in long hours, but only on the highest-value tasks. Our goal is to grow the company — and for everyone here to grow with it.
  • We move at the speed of light to delight our users : Our ideal sprint is three to four days. Our ideal shipping cadence is daily.
  • Artifacts are greater than talking : We communicate through action. That means documents, Figma files, Slack updates, commits, PRs — whatever it takes to keep work flowing asynchronously.

title: Advogado
description:

    • Perfil colaborativo, comprometido com resultados

    com o assunto:

title: Maintenance Coordinator
description:
Position: Maintenance Coordinator (Maternity Cover – with potential for permanent employment)

Location: Guarapari, ES – Brazil


Description:

CRC Evans is a leading global expert in the provision of welding and coating services. CRC Evans provides a unique combination of welding and coating services, equipment, technologies and integrated solutions, with an unparalleled reputation for excellence that has been gained over 90 years.


The Role

We are seeking a Maintenance Coordinator to join our team in Guarapari. The ideal candidate will lead maintenance planning and engineering processes, ensuring the reliability and performance of our industrial assets. English fluency is essential due to frequent communication with international teams.


Key Responsibilities

  • Implement reliability-centered maintenance strategies (FMEA/Failure analysis)
  • Develop and execute a 52-week maintenance plan
  • Define and monitor performance indicators
  • Manage lifecycle costs of industrial assets
  • Support SAP maintenance software implementation
  • Coordinate the reception and installation of new equipment, including planning, training, and contracts
  • Adapt UK procedures to Brazilian legislation and NR standards
  • Analyze equipment failures, maintenance loss profiles, and material resource planning
  • Liaise with both local and international procurement and importation teams
  • Promote and ensure compliance with company Health, Safety & Environmental policies


Key Requirements

  • Degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering
  • Proven leadership experience
  • Solid background in industrial maintenance and asset management
  • Expertise in reliability-centered maintenance
  • Proficient with SAP ERP and Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Power BI)
  • Strong problem-solving skills and process improvement mindset
  • Excellent teamwork and communication skills
  • Advanced English proficiency is required



Due to current workloads, we regret to inform that in the instance you have not heard from us within 2 weeks of your application, you are to consider your application unsuccessful at this time.

title: Senior Frontend (Angular) Engineer
description:
About Us

XILO , a fast-growing Vertical AI company recently backed by a Series A financing round, is seeking a highly experienced and driven Senior Frontend Engineer to elevate our Angular codebase, improve modularity, and mentor junior engineers in writing clean, maintainable front-end code.

Founded in 2019 by two best friends, Jon and Eli, XILO set out to revolutionize the insurance industry by solving its biggest challenges. Eli, a brokerage owner, brought invaluable industry expertise, while Jon, an experienced software engineer, saw an opportunity to innovate using technology. Initially launched as a vertical SaaS solution addressing core quoting challenges, XILO has since evolved into a trailblazing Vertical AI company leveraging the latest AI technology to transform the industry. By layering cutting-edge AI solutions onto its SaaS platform, XILO is driving innovation far beyond its original vision. Having recently closed our Series A funding round, XILO is growing rapidly and seeking talented individuals who want to do career-defining work in a mission-driven startup that’s at the forefront of AI innovation.


About The Role

You’ll be at the heart of shaping the user experience for thousands of insurance professionals, wrapping powerful AI-driven automation in an intuitive, efficient, and beautiful interface.

This isn’t just another frontend job. Insurance agents spend hours wrestling with outdated, clunky systems -your work will change that. We’ve seen first-hand how much frustration our automation removes, and with your help, we’ll take it even further – creating tools that don’t just work, but feel seamless, fast, and a joy to use.


We’re building with modern frontend technologies, including Angular , to ensure high performance, efficiency, and scalability. If you’re an expert in Angular’s latest features , you’ll have a unique opportunity to push the boundaries of frontend performance and UX in a data-heavy, AI-powered platform.


You’ll have the opportunity to work on:

  • Modern UI & UX for AI-Driven Automation – Designing interfaces that make complex workflows feel effortless
  • Agent-Focused Productivity Tools – Crafting dashboards and interactive tools that help agencies work faster and smarter
  • Seamless Platform Experience – Maintaining and evolving our design system to ensure a consistent, polished experience across the platform
  • AI-Powered Browser Extensions – Building extensions that bring AI Agents to life beyond APIs, automating workflows directly on carrier portals and legacy systems that don’t support direct integrations
  • Advanced PDF Processing & Rendering – Creating dynamic, interactive document management tools that handle complex insurance forms and policies seamlessly


Qualifications

  • 7+ years of frontend development experience, with a strong foundation in TypeScript and JavaScript.
  • Extensive experience with Angular (15-19), including migrating projects to newer versions.
  • Familiarity with NX monorepos to manage and scale frontend applications efficiently.
  • Optimizing build processes to improve application performance and loading times.
  • Proficient in REST API integration, including security and authentication strategies.
  • Hands-on experience developing browser extensions, extending automation beyond traditional web applications.
  • Bonus: Experience with WebSockets for real-time data updates and event-driven UI interactions.
  • Bonus: Full-stack experience with backend technologies like Node.js and Nest.js.


What we offer

  • Collaborative and innovative work environment.
  • Flex PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits), flexible work schedule.
  • Personal laptop.
  • Health and wellness package.


Why join XILO?

  • A great tech startup – Small, fast-moving, and driven by real impact
  • Endless career growth – Help shape the team, tech, and company as we scale
  • Strong leadership & backing – Work alongside experienced founders and tier 1 silicon-valley VCs

title: Líder de Serviços SAP Sênior
description:
A Softtek está em busca de Líder de Serviços SAP Sênior para fazer parte do nosso quadro de colaboradores apoiando um de nossos grandes clientes.

A Softtek valoriza a diversidade e inclusão em sua força de trabalho. A empresa tem uma equipe global com pessoas de diferentes origens e culturas, o que torna o ambiente de trabalho mais rico e interessante.

Independentemente da sua ,etnia, idade, gênero, orientação sexual, deficiência, credo ou convicção política, o que importa são as suas competências e habilidades para fazer acontecer.


Os Softtekians são seres humanos talentosos e auto-determinados que se consideram pessoas loucamente incríveis! Venha fazer parte desse time!!!


Quer saber mais? Acesse:


Sobre a Softtek:

Fundada em 1982, a Softtek é uma fornecedora global de soluções de TI orientadas a processos com 30 escritórios na América do Norte, América Latina, Europa e Ásia. Com 15 centros de entrega global nos EUA, México, China, Brasil, Argentina, Costa Rica, Espanha, Hungria e Índia, a Softtek ajuda a melhorar e produzir resultados previsíveis para corporações de primeira linha em mais de 20 países. A Softtek é a criadora e líder da indústria nearshore.

title: Application Support Specialist
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in production support, particularly within the securities or financial services industry. This role requires excellent interpersonal skills, the ability to work effectively with global teams, and a growth mindset.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide comprehensive production support for our applications, ensuring their reliability and performance.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to application functionality.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, business analysts, and global support teams, to address and resolve issues.
  • Monitor application performance and implement improvements to enhance stability and efficiency.
  • Document support processes and maintain accurate records of issues and resolutions.
  • Participate in on-call rotations to provide 24/7 support as needed.
  • Continuously improve support practices and contribute to the development of best practices.


Must-Have Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in a related discipline or equivalent work experience required; advanced degree is beneficial.
  • 3+ years of related production support experience required; experience in the securities or financial services industry is a plus.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to work with global teams.
  • Experience with basic scripting tools such as Python, Bash, PowerShell, Docker, etc.
  • Growth mindset and a proactive approach to problem-solving.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Advanced proficiency in DevOps, Agile, and Lean methodologies.
  • Business knowledge of securities, fund accounting, collateral, and tri-party repo preferred but not required.
  • Experience in platform engineering, cloud, virtual environments, MQ, database management, network, ITIL, and service management.

title: FP&A Manager
description:
Open English has been a leader in online English language education for over 15 years, delivering high-quality instruction to adults and children through our digital programs. As a global EdTech company operating in 25 countries across three continents, we offer engaging, results-driven classes that help learners develop real-world language skills.

We’re seeking passionate professionals to join our innovative, collaborative team. At Open English, you’ll have the opportunity to contribute ideas, drive meaningful change, and grow within a dynamic work environment.


Position Overview:

We are seeking a Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) Manager to support the development, analysis, and reporting of the company’s key financial and operational performance indicators. This role is instrumental in delivering actionable insights and supporting data-driven decision-making across the business.

The FP&A Manager will work closely with senior management and cross-functional teams to execute budgeting, forecasting, and performance analysis processes. The ideal candidate brings strong analytical skills, business acumen, and a proactive mindset to help identify trends, challenge assumptions, and drive continuous improvement in financial planning.



Responsibilities:

Planning & Forecasting

  • Lead workstreams within the preparation of the Annual Budget and Quarterly Forecasts, owning key revenue and cost drivers.
  • Develop dynamic financial models and scenario planning to support strategic decision-making.


Provide forward-looking analysis and recommendations to anticipate business risks and opportunities.


Reporting & Performance Analysis

  • Deliver monthly and quarterly management reporting packages, including Board-level presentations.
  • Perform detailed variance analysis versus budget, forecast, and prior periods, identifying key drivers and insights.
  • Partner with business units to understand operational performance and translate it into financial outcomes.


Decision Support & Business Partnership

  • Provide financial insights and actionable recommendations to support strategic initiatives and investment decisions.
  • Manage ad hoc and prospective financial analyses to evaluate business cases, pricing, and resource allocation.
  • Communicate complex financial results to non-financial stakeholders clearly and effectively.



Process Improvement & Systems

  • Enhance budgeting, forecasting, and reporting processes through automation and best practice implementation.
  • Lead or support system improvements and integration projects involving Adaptive Insights and other planning tools.

Champion continuous improvement initiatives to increase FP&A’s strategic impact and operational efficiency.



Collaboration & Leadership

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with teams such as Accounting, Operations, Sales, and Product to align financial planning with business goals.
  • Contribute to the development of junior team members through knowledge sharing and mentorship (if applicable).


Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business, Accounting, or a related field
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in FP&A, including managerial or team leadership responsibilities
  • Strong financial background
  • Experience with financial planning tools (e.g., Adaptive Insights, Anaplan, TM1, or similar)
  • C1 or higher level of English proficiency (written and spoken)
  • Advanced proficiency in Excel (e.g., modeling, pivot tables, lookups, macros) and PowerPoint for executive-level presentations


Desirable Requirements:

  • Experience in B2C, online subscription based business models
  • Coding experience such as Python, SQL, or related.

title: Recrutador corporativo (Inglês Fluente)
description:
Recrutador corporativo - Inglês Fluente

Oportunidade em Empresa Americana (Longo Prazo)


A Blue Dot , localizada em São Paulo, é uma empresa de BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) especializada em soluções de staffing para empresas nos Estados Unidos, oferecendo profissionais altamente qualificados para nossos clientes. Com mais de 10 anos de história, ajudamos dezenas de clientes a atender suas demandas, além de impulsionar a carreira de milhares de profissionais brasileiros no mercado norte-americano.


O que oferecemos:

  • Remuneração: R$5.000,00
  • Bônus: Em USD - Dólares.
  • Plano de crescimento: Oportunidade de crescimento para funções de gestão.
  • Estabilidade: Posição de longo prazo
  • Treinamento e capacitação: Oportunidade contínua de desenvolvimento profissional com treinamentos e certificações
  • 100% remoto.


Responsabilidades:


  • Atuar como Executive Recruiter, realizando as seguintes tarefas gerais, entre outras:
  • Colaborar com a equipe interna de recrutamento do cliente, proativamente buscando e pré-qualificando candidatos com base em requisições específicas (Medicina, Engenharia, Técnica, Construção, Jurídica, entre outras) para apresentar como candidatos ativos qualificados.
  • Gerar interesse dos candidatos por meio de estratégias criativas (e.g. email marketing, LinkedIn, postagens de vagas) para garantir um pipeline de talentos contínuo, atendendo tanto às necessidades atuais quanto ao crescimento futuro dos negócios.
  • Pré-qualificar talentos por meio de perfis, avaliando nível de interesse e tempo de disponibilidade via chamadas e emails.
  • Coordenar cronogramas de entrevistas entre clientes e candidatos em nome dos membros da equipe.
  • Manter e atualizar bancos de dados (Dynamics, LinkedIn Recruiter) com informações de candidatos ativos, desenvolvendo e atualizando descrições e especificações de vagas.
  • Identificar talentos em bancos de dados online, listas de contatos, banco de dados interno e indicações para preencher vagas rotineiras e difíceis.
  • Agendar e conduzir entrevistas para avaliar candidatos de forma independente.
  • Identificar e implementar formas inovadoras de atrair e conectar-se com um pool diversificado de candidatos.
  • Auxiliar na coordenação entre cliente e candidato em nome dos membros da equipe.


Requisitos:

  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação em inglês (Nível fluente, tanto verbal quanto escrito).
  • Mínimo de 3 ano de experiência como Recruiter , Talent Acquisition , Hunter ou Executive Recruiter .
  • Desejo de crescer dentro de uma empresa americana, com oportunidade de assumir outras funções de liderança no futuro.
  • Procuramos por profissionais com foco em resultados, pois oferecemos oportunidade de crescimento.
  • Ser Goal Oriented
  • Resiliente

title: [SOFTWARE ESPECIALIZADO 5] SOFTWARE ENGINEER III REACT
description:
Quem é Stone Tech?

A Stone nasceu com o propósito de ser protagonista na transformação da indústria de pagamentos, lutando para oferecer as melhores soluções para quem empreende no Brasil.

Pensando nisso, construímos a Stone Tech! A junção dos times de tecnologia Stone Co. e as empresas financeiras do grupo que reconhecem o potencial empreendedor de cada brasileiro. Por aqui, temos todas as inovações e tecnologias de ponta da Stone, Pagar.me, Ton e Vitta, com uma galera referência no mercado de tecnologia, em um ambiente descontraído, repleto de desafios, oportunidades, flexibilidade, teamplay e desenvolvimento contínuo.

Nossa cultura:

Por aqui, vivemos nossa cultura no dia a dia, guiados por esses 5 pilares:

title: SR Fullstack Developer Node.js/Angular V.17+ (+ Electron Framework)
description:
Muito prazer, somos a Zallpy!

Somos muito mais que uma empresa de tecnologia; somos uma comunidade diversa, plural e talentosa. Nosso propósito é liderar a transformação digital, com excelência e agilidade, promovendo crescimento mútuo e genuíno em relações éticas e duradouras. Flexibilidade é uma de nossas marcas registradas, atuamos em diferentes modelos e formatos de equipe, mantendo nossa cultura leve, colaborativa e integrada, proporcionando equidade de oportunidades em um espaço onde todos se sintam seguros e ouvidos.


O que você vai fazer:


  • Desenvolver Aplicações Desktop: Crie e implemente soluções eficientes utilizando Electron Framework, integrando Node.js, TypeScript e tecnologias web, com foco em aplicações multiplataforma.
  • Colaborar em Times Ágeis: Trabalhe em uma estrutura de times ágeis, participando ativamente de trocas de informações e colaborando em um ambiente dinâmico e iterativo.
  • Participação em Cerimônias Ágeis: Contribua para a definição do backlog do produto, participe de Sprints, Dailies, Reviews e Retrospectivas, ajudando a equipe a alcançar seus objetivos.
  • Gerenciar Tarefas e Comunicações: Mantenha o quadro de tarefas atualizado, destacando o que está pendente, em andamento e identificando possíveis bloqueios. Use ferramentas de comunicação da empresa para se manter alinhado com o time.
  • Entrega de Código de Qualidade: Realize entregas de código robusto, testável e escalável, coberto por testes unitários e de integração, garantindo alta qualidade em ambiente desktop.
  • Revisão de Código: Submeta Pull Requests para revisão do time, compartilhando conhecimento e promovendo melhorias contínuas no código.


O que estamos buscando:


  • Inglês avançado ou fluente, com excelente habilidade de conversação e escrita.
  • Formação superior em Tecnologia da Informação ou áreas afins (em andamento ou concluída).
  • Experiência no desenvolvimento de aplicações utilizando Electron Framework , Node.js e TypeScript .
  • Experiência com gerenciamento de versões utilizando Git e Git Flow .
  • Sólida experiência em testes unitários e de integração utilizando Jest .
  • Experiência no desenvolvimento de aplicações desktop com alto volume de dados e processamento assíncrono.
  • Experiência na criação de APIs RESTful e uso de GraphQL .
  • Proficiente no uso de bancos de dados como MongoDB , SQL e PostgreSQL .


Será um diferencial se você:


  • Conhecimentos em Design Patterns , como SOLID e Clean Code ;
  • Experiência em ETL ;
  • Experiência em orquestração de contêineres com Kubernetes e Docker ;
  • Experiência na criação/manutenção de pipelines de CI/CD ;
  • Experiência no desenvolvimento de interfaces utilizando React.js , com foco em componentização e estilização com styled-components .


Onde você vai trabalhar:

  • Esta é uma posição para atuação 100% remota.

Modalidade de contratação:

  • CLT;

O que oferecemos:

Vale Alimentação/Refeição: Utilizamos o cartão multibenefício EVA, em formato crédito, para proporcionar flexibilidade nas suas compras diárias.*

Plano de Saúde Unimed: Sem coparticipação ou carência para o titular. Dependentes como filhos, cônjuges ou enteados podem ser incluídos com coparticipação.*

title: Ecommerce Growth Marketing Paid Media Specialist
description:
We are a DTC Ecommerce Growth Consulting & Marketing Company focused on helping service businesses attract, engage, and convert their ideal audience.

Our Mission: to help DTC ecommerce companies grow holistically

Our Vision: We imagine a world where service businesses never have to worry about meeting revenue goals, attracting consistent quality customers, retaining customers, or maintaining and growing their overall online presence.


Our Values:

- Treat others the way we want to be treated

- Pay close attention to detail 

- Don't neglect the small things, they matter

- Think critically and be a problem solver, not a problem creator

- Confidence and determination to achieve our vision.


Who We Are Looking For:


We are looking for an ecommerce Paid Media Specialist who has experience managing large ad budgets across Meta and Google primarily. (Ideally over 1 million dollars USD per month).


The candidate selected for this role would come in and manage the Meta, Google, and/or TikTok ad accounts for US based ecommerce brands. We have a lot of high-profile ecommerce clients that we work with and we are looking for a seasoned Paid Media Specialist who can produce high quality results for our clients.


The right candidate will be task-oriented, analytical, and willing to keep the team and ad accounts on pace to make sure we are meeting or exceeding client expectations. A self-starter who can see problems and go to work fixing them and not be just an order taker. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in managing Facebook Ads and Google Ads for US based ecommerce brands.


Must have a portfolio of work that demonstrates the results that you have been able to provide and the KPIs you have hit. Must also demonstrate your skills with creative testing through media buying on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok ads.


Responsibilities

  • Manage the Meta, Google, and/or TikTok ad accounts of US based ecommerce brands
  • Run ad campaigns across Meta, Google, and TikTok
  • Monitor ROAS, ad budgets, revenue, and core KPIs to optimize campaigns and achieve the desired results for our clients
  • Run profitable creative testing campaigns and identify trends to be able to communicate with the client what is working and what we should be creating more of
  • Create performance marketing reports for the accounts that you are managing to accurately display the analytics, results, and next steps
  • Strategize on ways to improve the overall marketing strategy for our brands to increase effectiveness
  • Maintain awareness of current industry and technology standards, social media, competitive landscape, and market trends


Qualifications & Experience

  • Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field OR 3-4 years of experience OR alternative education experience (mentors or courses)
  • Prior experience working for an ecommerce brand or advertising agency is preferred
  • Must be proficient in Facebook & Google Ads management for ecommerce brands
  • Must be proficient in scaling ad budgets
  • Strong communication, conceptual thinking, and a hunger to always provide great results for our clients
  • Autonomous worker with an analytical mind
  • Portfolio of work, results, or case studies
  • You should be comfortable using some internal communication tools such as Monday.com, Google Drive, Zoom, and Slack for team meetings and to support other team members with any technical request. Experience with Monday.com or Asana is not required but please let us know if you have used it before or not.
  • You should also be confident enough to push back on the leadership team and express your opinion if you think the ship is heading off course. We encourage that.

title: Caldeireiro Encanador Sênior (Liderança)
description:
CALDEIREIRO ENCANADOR SÊNIOR (LÍDER) 


Local: Onshore – Macaé/RJ


Sobre a empresa


Empresa de metal mecânica em ritmo de crescimento, atuando com manutenção industrial, montagem, pintura, solda e caldeiraria, atendendo projetos portuários, marítimos, offshore e onshore. Ambiente técnico, com oportunidades de evolução junto com o crescimento da operação.


Sobre a oportunidade


A oportunidade é para atuação híbrida Onshore com embarques esporádicos, com jornada regular de trabalho, oferecendo previsibilidade de rotina e estabilidade profissional. O profissional terá participação direta na liderança de processos produtivos e condução de equipes em serviços de manutenção, montagem e reparo industrial. O ambiente de trabalho valoriza profissionais com experiência sólida e comprometimento de longo prazo, com possibilidade de desenvolvimento técnico e de crescimento alinhado à expansão gradual da empresa, que vem ampliando sua carteira de projetos e contratos no setor.


  • Manutenção, montagem e reparo de caldeiras, tubulações e correlatos.


  • Supervisão direta de equipe operacional e acompanhamento de execução de serviços


  • Leitura de projetos e desenhos técnicos


  • Coordenação de rotinas produtivas e apoio em precificação e orçamentos


  • Atuação em conformidade com normas de segurança e qualidade


Requisitos


  • Formação Técnica em Caldeiraria Industrial, Estruturas Metálicas, Mecânica Industrial ou áreas correlatas.
  • Experiência sólida como caldeireiro encanador industrial (mínimo 5 a 10 anos)
  • Vivência prática como encarregado em liderança de equipes e gestão de produção
  • Conhecimento em manutenção industrial, construção e reparos em caldeiras e linhas de tubulação
  • Leitura e interpretação de desenhos técnicos
  • Comprometimento, organização e postura profissional


Beneficios

Salário regime CLT/Onshore

️ Vale-refeição

Plano de saúde - extensivo à família coparticipativo

Ambiente com oportunidades reais de crescimento


Se você busca um projeto sólido e valorização do seu conhecimento técnico, essa pode ser uma excelente oportunidade de construir junto.

title: Consultor Óptico
description:
Somos a EssilorLuxottica, líder global no design, fabricação e distribuição de lentes oftálmicas, armações e óculos de sol.


Formada em 2018 pela combinação da Essilor e da Luxottica, nossa empresa combina dois séculos de inovação e esforço humano para elevar o cuidado com a visão e a experiência do consumidor ao seu redor.

Somos o lar das marcas de óculos e cuidados com a visão mais amadas e amplamente reconhecidas do mundo. Nossas marcas proprietárias de óculos incluem Ray-Ban, Oakley, Costa, Vogue Eyewear, Persol e Oliver Peoples, complementadas por mais de 20 marcas licenciadas de prestígio. Nossas tecnologias avançadas de lentes incluem Varilux, Crizal, Eyezen, Stellest e Transitions. Oferecemos experiências superiores de compras e pacientes com uma rede de 18.000 lojas, incluindo marcas de varejo de classe mundial como Sunglass Hut, LensCrafters, Salmoiraghi & Viganò e GrandVision.


Estamos em busca de um novo colaborador(a) para fazer parte da nossa equipe Comercial como Consultor Óptico , em nossa base do Distrito Federal.


Quais serão as minhas atividades e responsabilidades?


• Realizar visitas médicas para apresentar e promover nosso portfólio de produtos, fortalecendo a presença e a recomendação de nossas marcas no ambiente clínico.

• Atuar junto ao varejo, reforçando o relacionamento com óticas, garantindo alinhamento estratégico e visibilidade das marcas.

• Apoiar a execução das estratégias de marketing e trade marketing em campo.

Requisitos necessários:

• Experiência prévia em visitação médica e/ou atuação comercial no varejo ótico ou farmacêutico;

• Boa capacidade de relacionamento e comunicação;

• Visão estratégica e foco em resultados;

• Habilidade para transitar entre os públicos médico e comercial.

• CNH ativa;

• Superior completo.


Benefícios da vaga:


  • Assistência Médica e Odontológica;
  • Vale Refeição;
  • Veículo da empresa e auxílio combustível;
  • Seguro de Vida;
  • Auxílio Funerário;
  • Auxílio Creche;
  • WellHub (Gympass);
  • PPR;
  • Desconto em nossas marcas;
  • Modelo Presencial.


A EssilorLuxottica valoriza e apoia a diversidade, por esse motivo, todas as nossas vagas são abertas para candidaturas de profissionais PCD's.


Faça parte da nossa empresa e ajude a projetar o futuro da saúde visual. Enxergue o seu #FutureInSight com a EssilorLuxottica. Nós olhamos para o futuro!

title: Técnico de planejamento
description:
Descrição do Cargo:



Vaga disponível inclusive para Pessoas com Deficiência ou Reabilitados pelo INSS.

title: Power BI Engineer
description:
We are a high-growth, disruptive company combining gold and technology. Our vision is to help the world rediscover honest money. The successful candidate brings significant skills to help propel us forward on our mission.


We are seeking an experienced Power BI Engineer with a strong SQL background to design, build, and maintain robust reporting solutions. The ideal candidate will have a proven ability to develop semantic data models, craft efficient SQL queries, ensure data quality through Power Query transformations, design intuitive dashboards using advanced Power BI visualizations and DAX measures, and establish proper security protocols. This role will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, translating business requirements into impactful data-driven insights.


Key Responsibilities:


Data Modeling & Querying

  • Develop and maintain data models (star/snowflake schema) in Power BI, leveraging advanced SQL queries.
  • Create semantic models that accurately represent business logic and support optimal report performance.

ETL & Data Transformations

  • Utilize Power Query for data shaping, cleaning, and transformation, ensuring data integrity and consistency.
  • Collaborate with data engineering teams to integrate various data sources (e.g., relational databases, APIs, CSV files).

Report & Dashboard Development

  • Design and build interactive, user-friendly Power BI dashboards and reports that convey insights effectively.
  • Develop, optimize, and maintain DAX calculations, measures, and KPIs.

Security & Governance

  • Implement Row-Level Security (RLS) or other relevant Power BI security features to protect sensitive data.
  • Work with management teams to ensure adherence to data governance and regulatory requirements.

Performance Tuning & Troubleshooting

  • Optimize Power BI data models, queries, and measures for performance and scalability.
  • Diagnose and resolve report rendering and data refresh performance issues.

Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement

  • Partner with business stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver actionable reports and insights.
  • Provide training, documentation, and support to end-users and other internal teams.

Continuous Improvement

  • Stay current with emerging Power BI capabilities, DAX best practices, SQL performance enhancements, and analytics trends.
  • Contribute to the development of best practices for analytics, data governance, and solution design.


Qualifications:


Experience:

  • 3+ years of professional experience with Power BI development, including data modeling, Power Query, and DAX.
  • Strong SQL proficiency , including complex joins, stored procedures, and performance tuning.
  • Technical Skills:
  • Power BI : Data modeling, DAX, Power Query M.
  • SQL : SQL, query optimization, data warehousing concepts.
  • ETL Tools & Processes : Understanding of data pipelines, transformations, and integration.
  • Version Control (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines for BI solutions (a plus).
  • Familiarity with Row-Level Security and other Power BI security features.
  • Experience with Azure Data Services (e.g., Azure Synapse, Azure Analysis Services) is a plus.


Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication skills to collaborate with stakeholders and translate technical findings into actionable insights.
  • Adaptable team player who can work in an agile environment.
  • Proven problem-solving skills and high attention to detail.


Language:

  • C1 English Proficiency Required.


Compensation:

  • Competitive Salary
  • Company Provided Computer
  • Stock Options
  • Flexible PTO


Application Instructions:

  • To apply, please send a cover letter and resume to

title: Analista Sr (Contratos) - Gestão de Projetos - Corporativo
description:
Fundada em 1977, a Rede D’Or é a maior rede privada de assistência médica integrada do país, com 46 anos de existência.

Em 23 de dezembro de 2022, a proposta de valor da Rede D’Or foi reforçada significativamente com a consumação da combinação de negócios com a SulAmérica – a maior seguradora do Brasil e uma das maiores operadoras de saúde do país. Com atuação nos segmentos de seguro saúde e odonto, vida e acidentes pessoais, gestão de ativos e previdência privada, a SulAmérica conta com mais de 4 mil pessoas colaboradoras e possui mais de 7 milhões de clientes distribuídos por todo Brasil.

Acreditamos na responsabilidade em contribuir para uma sociedade mais justa, inclusiva e com igualdade de oportunidades, por isso, todas as nossas vagas estão abertas a pessoas de diferentes perfis e contextos, inclusive pessoas com deficiência.

Se você é uma pessoa qualificada, de perfil inovador e sintonizada com o que há de mais atual em sua área de atuação, junte-se à nossa equipe.

Oferecemos mais que vagas de trabalho, oferecemos oportunidades para você fazer a diferença.


Requisitos:

- Superior completo em Administração, Engenharia, Arquitetura ou áreas relacionadas;

- Pós-graduação Gestão de Projetos ou Gestão Hospitalar será um diferencial;

- Vivência anterior com contratos no âmbito hospitalar ;

- Experiência em gerenciamento de projetos, preferencialmente com implantação de contratos de terceirização na área hospitalar;

- Domínio de ferramentas de gestão de projetos (MS Project, Planner e Monday);

- Pacote office avançado.


Atividades:

- Gerenciar projetos de implantação de contratos de serviços de facilities em unidades hospitalares, do planejamento à execução;

- Realizar o mapeamento de processos e diagnóstico das necessidades das unidades;

- Conduzir análises de viabilidade técnica, operacional e financeira dos contratos;

- Elaborar cronogramas, planos de ação e acompanhar a execução junto às áreas envolvidas e fornecedores;

- Garantir o alinhamento dos contratos às normas da ANVISA, NR’s e demais legislações aplicáveis ao setor hospitalar;

- Atuar como elo entre os stakeholders internos (assistencial, operações, jurídico, suprimentos, financeiro) e os fornecedores contratados;

- Participar ativamente da definição de indicadores de desempenho (KPIs) e acompanhar os resultados pós-implantação;

- Contribuir com a gestão de riscos dos projetos, propondo planos de mitigação;

- Apoiar a padronização de processos e práticas de facilities nas unidades hospitalares.


Outras informações:

- Botafogo (RJ) / Itaim Bibi (SP);

- 2ª a 5ª - 08h às 18h e 6ª - 08h às 17h;

- Regime Híbrido.

title: .NET Full Stack Developer (with Azure experience; Home Office)
description:
ITTConnect is seeking an Azure .Net Full Stack Developer to work for one of our clients. This is a role with a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services present in nearly 50 countries.


Job location: Remote, work anywhere from Brazil.


This job requires excellent English, written and spoken. Please submit a resume in English and be prepared for English language interviews throughout the process.


Requirements:

  • 8+ years of IT experience
  • Hands-on experience with Azure services as a Azure Full Stack Developer (e.g., Azure App Services, Functions, SQL Database, Key Vault, Azure Monitor, Azure Application Insights, Azure Storage, Azure Service Bus etc.)
  • Strong experience with .NET Core, C#, and ASP.NET MVC/Web API
  • Proficiency in database design and development with SQL Server and NoSQL databases ( Cosmos DB, MongoDB preferred)
  • Experience with containers (Docker and Kubernetes)
  • Willingness to learn Dapr, Biceps and DevOps concepts.
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code (IaC) using ARM templates.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps
  • Knowledge of Entity Framework
  • Familiarity/experience with Messaging and event handling
  • Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Ability to work both independently and in a team environment
  • Experience of working in an Agile environment is an advantage

title: Advogado(a) Pleno – Contencioso cível estratégico
description:
Estamos contratando um(a) advogado(a) com no mínimo 5 anos de formado(a) e com experiência em contencioso civil estratégico para trabalhar em nosso escritório do Rio de Janeiro.


Descrição da vaga:

• Graduação em Direito e OAB ativa;

title: Coordenador de Obras - Engenharia Civil
description:
Somos uma empresa inserida em um ambiente de mudanças. Estamos à procura de uma pessoa bem organizada e atenta aos detalhes e queira se juntar à equipe como Coordenador de Obras.


O que esperamos de você:

  • Bacharelado em Engenharia Civil
  • Experiência anterior (5> anos) em função semelhante é obrigatória
  • Experiência anterior (2> anos) com supervisão no local e gerenciamento de projetos e obras são obrigatórios
  • Pós-graduação em Gerenciamento de Projetos é um diferencial
  • Boas habilidades de comunicação escrita e verbal
  • Excelentes habilidades organizacionais – com a capacidade de priorizar, multitarefa e gerenciar a própria carga de trabalho diariamente.
  • Atitude "hands-on", para controlar o processo de construção e os custos do projeto
  • Capacidade de trabalho em equipe com autonomia.
  • Abordagem "poder fazer" ao lidar e negociar diretamente com nossos parceiros de desenvolvimento
  • Mentalidade de visão de dono para controlar processos de construção, qualidade e custos
  • Experiências anteriores em projetos e obras de hospitalidade (ou coordenação de projetos de grande porte e complexidade, como hotéis, shoppings, hospitais, etc.).
  • Experiências anteriores em projetos de Retrofit/ Revitalização é um diferencial
  • O conhecimento avançado do Autocad é obrigatório
  • O conhecimento do Pacote Office avançado (Word, Excel, Powerpoint) é obrigatório
  • O conhecimento do MS Project é um diferencial
  • Inglês Avançado / Fluente é um diferencial


O que você vai fazer:

  • Executar com sucesso os projetos e as obras desde o estágio de design, orçamento, planejamento até sua conclusão.
  • Definir planejamento de obras junto com o Gerente de Obras, fazendo pedidos e organizando a logística de acordo.
  • Elaborar um relatório regular com a área DCI sobre o progresso das obras.
  • Gerenciar as atividades das obras, para que sejam cumpridas as normas técnicas e as legislações vigentes.
  • Acompanhar os processos e as aprovações das licenças necessárias para as obras.
  • Monitorar o processamento de todos os pagamentos, a fim de autorizá-los para que os prazos de quitação sejam cumpridos.
  • Fiscalizar os procedimentos e a execução das obras para garantir sejam entregues de acordo com os mais altos padrões de qualidade.
  • Acompanhar o cronograma físico e financeiro para certificar que o andamento das obras está conforme planejado.
  • Garantir a elaboração e entrega de todos os Manuais Técnicos no final de cada obra para os hotéis.
  • Apoiar a área AM na administração do processo de construção e gestão através da boa execução, planejamento e monitoramento, seguindo as diretrizes Hotelaria Alba, requisitos Accor Hotels e 'Must Haves'.
  • Estabelecer e controlar a documentação dos projetos, construção e aspectos técnicos, respeitando e implementando as normas e procedimentos técnicos da marca hoteleira.
  • Comunicação regular entre os Gerentes do Hotel, Gerente de Projetos, empreiteiros, fornecedores, designers e outras partes interessadas.
  • Qualquer outro dever e instrução razoavelmente relacionados com a posição e a necessidade do negócio.


O que oferecemos a você:

  • Salário competitivo com o mercado
  • Programa de Participação nos Resultados
  • Plano de saúde
  • Plano odontológico
  • Seguro de vida em grupo
  • Vale-transporte
  • Vale-refeição/alimentação
  • Plano de previdência privada
  • Reembolso em farmácia
  • Auxílio creche
  • Auxílio formação
  • Wellhub
  • Desconto em hotéis da rede Accor
  • Trabalho híbrido
  • Licenças estendidas
  • Plano de fidelidade (5, 10 e 20 anos)


Declaração de diversidade

Encorajamos fortemente os candidatos de todas as diferentes origens e identidades a se candidatarem. Cada nova contratação é uma oportunidade para trazermos uma perspectiva diferente, e estamos sempre ansiosos para diversificar ainda mais nossa empresa. Nossa empresa está empenhada em construir um lugar inclusivo e de apoio para que você possa fazer o melhor trabalho de sua carreira.

title: Supervisor de Saúde Preventiva
description:
Descrição do Cargo:

Estamos em busca de um supervisor de Saúde Preventiva para iniciativas estratégicas líderes em promoção da saúde e prevenção de doenças. O profissional será responsável por gerenciar programas voltados ao bem-estar, implementar ações educativas e integrativas, e monitorar indicadores de saúde, garantindo impacto positivo e sustentável na qualidade de vida dos participantes.


Como será o seu dia a dia?

  • Planejar, implementar e supervisionar programas de promoção à saúde e prevenção de doenças;
  • Coordenar equipes multidisciplinares, alinhando práticas preventivas às necessidades do público-alvo;
  • Desenvolver campanhas educativas em saúde física, mental e social;
  • Monitorar indicadores de desempenho e eficácia dos programas;
  • Parcerias Articulares Estratégicas com Fornecedores e Stakeholders;
  • Garantir a conformidade das ações com as legislações e regulamentações vigentes.


O que você precisa ter para embarcar nesse desafio?

  • Formação superior em Psicologia, Nutrição, Enfermagem ou Serviço Social ;
  • Experiência comprovada em gestão de programas de saúde, promoção e prevenção de doenças;
  • Habilidade em gestão de equipes e projetos;
  • Conhecimento em boas práticas de saúde preventiva e modelos de atenção à saúde;
  • Desejável pós-graduação ou especialização em Saúde Pública, Gestão de Projetos ou áreas correlatas;
  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e resolução de problemas.


Diferenciais:

  • Experiência em gestão de saúde corporativa ou em organizações de saúde;
  • Familiaridade com ferramentas de análise de indicadores e relatórios.


Benefícios que oferecemos

title: Writer
description:
As Blueclip, we started our journey to bring the most creative minds and the know-how together to deliver great works.


About Our Search

We are currently searching for talented Scriptwriters with exceptional writing skills to create video essay scripts with captivating stories for one of our clients which is a dynamic content creation company specializing in high-quality, engaging video essays.


What You'll Do:

Ideation:

  • Collaborate with the content team to generate ideas with broad audience appeal.

Research and Development:

  • Conduct thorough research to support the script with credible sources to ensure accuracy.
  • Document sources to support post-production with key supporting assets, including social media posts, articles, reports, etc.

Scriptwriting:

  • Develop compelling storylines with strong audience retention techniques.
  • Integrate visual and audio elements to enhance the narrative.

Collaboration and Editing:

  • Work with producers to ensure a cohesive final product.
  • Revise scripts based on team feedback for clarity and engagement.


Celebrity Content:

  • Research various topics related to celebrity and propose video ideas.
  • Write, revise, and edit scripts focused on the celebrity world, ensuring accuracy and engaging storytelling.
  • Create scripts to guide the production execution and video assets assembly process, ensuring all content meets YouTube channel standards.
  • Manage all narrative, storytelling, and scriptwriting aspects to optimize content for YouTube and other social media platforms.


Job Requirements

  • Experience in writing successful YouTube videos, ideally with knowledge of celebrity content
  • An advanced level of English is a MUST.
  • A portfolio showcasing writing ability, attention to detail, and the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and engagingly.
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to meet tight deadlines.
  • Strong attention to detail and a commitment to producing high-quality content that meets YouTube channel standards.
  • Passionate about educating, entertaining, and inspiring others

title: Murex Support Engineer
description:

title: Consultor SAP SR
description:
Viva a experiência SONDA!

Aqui você transforma sua carreira!

Por que fazer parte da SONDA?

Porque assim como você, amamos o que fazemos, temos paixão por inovação e estamos convencidos de que através do conhecimento e da tecnologia vamos transformar não só os negócios de nossos clientes, mas também o futuro.


Na SONDA você terá uma experiência de trabalho com diversas oportunidades de desenvolvimento pessoal e profissional. Um excelente lugar para aprender e contribuir para melhorar a qualidade de vida das pessoas por meio da tecnologia

Procuramos Consultor de Implementação SAP Sênior que queira aprender e transformar sua carreira.

Modalidade de Trabalho: Atuação em formato 100% remoto , de 08h às 17h, de segunda a sexta.

Nesta função você irá:

  • Realizar levantamento de requisitos técnicos e funcionais em conjunto com o time de negócios e arquitetura;
  • Documentar todas as integrações existentes (funcional e tecnicamente)
  • Participar ativamente de reuniões técnicas e de alinhamento;
  • Elaborar documentação técnica e funcional clara e estruturada.

Ideal se você tiver:

  • Superior completo na área de TI;
  • Experiência com SAP ABAP em projetos relevantes;
  • Experiência comprovada em SAP PI/XI, com foco em cenários de integração;
  • Habilidade para elaborar documentação técnica e funcional clara e estruturada;
  • Boa comunicação e postura consultiva.

E mais ainda se você se destacar por:

  • Experiência anterior com integrações legadas críticas (mainframe, APIs REST/SOAP externas, etc.);
  • Vivência em projetos com metodologias ágeis.


O que você pode esperar de nós?

  • Flexibilidade de trabalho, promovendo o equilíbrio entre sua vida pessoal e profissional. Desenvolvimento profissional e evolução constante das suas competências, sempre de acordo com os seus interesses.
  • Um ambiente colaborativo, diverso e inovador, que incentiva o trabalho em equipe.


O que oferecemos?

  • SONDA Academy: uma plataforma de aprendizado que busca maximizar seu desenvolvimento profissional.
  • SONDA Wellness, um programa que busca apoiá-lo no equilíbrio da sua vida pessoal e profissional, promovendo uma série de iniciativas focadas na sua saúde física, menta e social.
  • E muito mais!


+ Diversidade + Inclusão = Inovação e colaboração


Na SONDA estamos comprometidos com a diversidade. Promovemos um ambiente inclusivo, garantindo que os talentos possam trabalhar em um ambiente positivo que os convide a desenvolver sua carreira profissional com igualdade de oportunidades. Sabermos que a diversidade é um elemento fundamental para impulsionar a inovação, é por isso que buscamos candidatos com base em suas qualificações profissionais, independentemente de raça, cor da pele, religião, idade, sexo, orientação sexual, identidade de gênero, nacionalidade ou deficiência.

Faça parte da nossa equipe!

title: CRM - brazil
description:
VAGAS ABERTAS: Analista / Especialista/ Coordenador CRM com fluência em espanhol


Descrição da Vaga:

Buscamos um(a) profissional de CRM com experiência no mercado de iGaming, responsável por desenvolver e executar estratégias de relacionamento e retenção de usuários, utilizando dados e automação para maximizar o lifetime value (LTV) dos jogadores.

Você atuará diretamente na criação de campanhas segmentadas, automações personalizadas e análises de comportamento, sempre alinhado(a) com as regras de compliance do setor e práticas de jogo responsável.

  • Monitorar KPIs de performance como churn rate, LTV, ROI das campanhas e engajamento.
  • Garantir conformidade com regulamentações locais e internacionais (GDPR, LGPD, jogo responsável).
  • Conduzir testes A/B e otimizações contínuas para maximizar resultados.
  • Manter-se atualizado(a) sobre tendências, ferramentas e melhores práticas do mercado de CRM e iGaming.


Requisitos:

  • Experiência prévia em CRM, preferencialmente no setor de iGaming, apostas esportivas e casino online.
  • Conhecimento das ferramentas Optimove e Smartico
  • Habilidade com análise de dados, SQL e ferramentas de BI.
  • Forte orientação a resultados e foco em métricas.
  • Conhecimento das regulamentações de proteção de dados e compliance em iGaming.
  • Perfil analítico, criativo e colaborativo.
  • Espanhol Fluente



Diferenciais:

  • Noções de UX e jornada do cliente.
  • Conhecimento em marketing digital, SEO e paid media.
  • Certificações em CRM, marketing digital ou análise de dados.
